title: MongoDB Architecture
subject: MongoDB
theory: MongoDB's architecture involves Database -> Collection -> Document. It uses WiredTiger as the default storage engine, offering document-level concurrency and compression.

interview_questions.question: What is the default storage engine in MongoDB?

real_world_use_cases.description: WiredTiger's compression reduces I/O wait times, allowing faster reads.

summary: Understanding underlying architecture helps in tuning performance and ensuring data safety.
